Title: Permits teachers licensed in another state to teach in New York while completing state-specific teaching certification or licensure requirements
Summary: Permits teachers licensed in another state to teach in New York while completing state-specific teaching certification or licensure requirements; establishes such requirements must be met within one year from the date such teacher began teaching in New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to permitting teachers licensed in another state to teach in New York while completing state-specific teaching certification or licensure requirements
